title: Who should you listen to in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Everyone who are motivating me for letting me work of my own goals and dreams to achieve it. Whereas also work on the newest skill once dealing with past and leave them behind. Moreover usually listen to the important person such as Teacher-Who will surely work with me on the skills which I will pursue it for the career.Parents- As they know the life very well and also the best decision which they can make it in no time. Respect every single person with whom I m in communication line or not especially senior and junior.Friends- Those friends who actually help in every situation. Whereas also motivates to learn from the mistakes which we ever created the most.Videos/Movies- In english and hindi languages which show positive messages towards the life which can be applied in real. As well as also make life more adventerous by taking trip in the presence of the negative aspect which automatically follows.Colleagues- Senior or junior, as every person has to listen to the opinio to look for the positive message and reason to work on it.Tour guider- The least person with whom we can get anything about the location which we never visited the most especially me.Boss- The man who actually teach us about the respect of the work which we get once finally make it into the company. Whereas also to learn from him to avoid the mistake which he or she created at her time.Room mate-There are certain times when we have to share the room with other person who we dosent know until dont met in real life.Partner- One of the most important person with whom we start the life by sharing 50% of each life in certain days. That can be occurred anywhere either the work or study time.I believe it is those person whom we considered it the most important person in life either we stay with them or away from them. But always follow their respective rules and decision as it can make things better in life by avoiding negative thoughts which makes life more slow in the fast time.
